turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm having trouble with my new smart thermostat. It keeps displaying an error message and won't connect to the Wi-Fi.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I'm sorry to hear you're experiencing issues with your smart thermostat. Could you please tell me the exact error message you are seeing?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: It says 'E10: Wi-Fi connection failed'. I've tried restarting it a bunch of times, but nothing works. This is so frustrating!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. E10 usually indicates a problem with the Wi-Fi credentials or the router. First, could you please ensure you've entered the correct Wi-Fi password? Double-check capitalization and any special characters.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, I've triple-checked the password. I even tried forgetting the network on my phone and reconnecting to make sure I knew the password. It's definitely correct.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay. Next, please try moving the thermostat closer to your Wi-Fi router. Sometimes, the signal strength isn't sufficient. Also, is your router broadcasting on the 2.4 GHz band? The thermostat doesn't support 5 GHz networks.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: The router is pretty close already, but I'll try moving it closer. And yes, I'm using the 2.4 GHz band. Okay, it seems to be connecting now! Wow, I'm so relieved. Thank you!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Excellent! I'm glad to hear it's working now. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Actually, yes. Now that it's connected, I'm trying to set up a schedule, but it's not letting me set different temperatures for different days of the week. Is that even possible?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, the thermostat does allow for different temperatures on different days. You will need to access the advanced settings menu. However, depending on the model, the specific menu structure can vary. I'll need the exact model number of your thermostat to provide more specific instructions. Please locate this information on the device itself or its packaging.
